description.value:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip divine spell.

You coat a weapon you're wielding in prayers and the divine power given to you by your deity. Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an extra @Damage[1d6[positive]] damage. As usual for positive damage, this damage harms only undead and creatures with negative healing.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon]
